titleStmt.title: The history of imbanking and drayning of divers fenns and marshes, both in forein parts and in this kingdom, and of the improvements thereby extracted from records, manuscripts, and other authentick testimonies / by William Dugdale.
titleStmt.author: Dugdale, William, Sir, 1605-1686.

titleStmt.title: The history of imbanking and drayning of divers fenns and marshes, both in forein parts and in this kingdom, and of the improvements thereby extracted from records, manuscripts, and other authentick testimonies / by William Dugdale.
titleStmt.author: Dugdale, William, Sir, 1605-1686.

notesStmt.note: Pages 134 and 135 have faded print with some loss of text in filmed copy. Pages 130-145 and 250-265 photographed from Cambridge University copy and inserted at end.
Appended at end: An act for confirmation of certain decrees of sewers made by the Commissioners for the limits of the levell of the River of Ancholme, in the county of Lincolne.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
